name: Islid
description:
A trip through a hypnagogic state.

Silent, but if you happen to have Morton Feldman* playing in the background, that works.

Instructions: click mouse button and hold to move. 'I' to invert colors, if you prefer.

Epilepsy warning: strobe effects.

Created with Unity3D and BlendMode plugin.

"It is a pure, abstract experience, and if I had to compare it to any traditional horror scenario, I have to wonder if it's similar to the feelings supposedly experienced during an alien abduction." - Michelle Ehrhardt, Kill Screen

Selected for the LeftField Collection at EGX Rezzed 2018.

* Originally this linked to another composition of his that was pulled offline.
